name: Rota-Morphs
description:
KenneyJam2021: Rotation

Time: 48hrs

------------

3 small creatures from the planet Rot need to get through some levels to achieve a goal they have in common, but each of them is only capable of one thing. 

- The Green Rot can jump

- The Blue Rot can throw boards to attack enemies

- The Pink Rot can stick to walls and climb them.

------------

Controls

- Move: A / D or L. Stick

- Action: Space or RB

- Aim: Mouse or R. Stick

- Climb: W / S or L. Stick

- Swap Rot: 1 / 2 / 3 or Left / Up / Right

The controller does not work in menus
